alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County through 630 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pueblo Depot, or 7 miles east of Pueblo Airport, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
